mapper.select: SELECT FROM dj_basics_product where goods_id=#{goodsId} ORDER BY create_date desc

SELECT FROM dj_basics_product where label_id=#{labelId} ORDER BY create_date desc

SELECT FROM dj_basics_product where data_status = 0
and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY create_date desc

select p.id as id, p.name as name, p.goods_id as goodsId, p.category_id as categoryId, p.product_sn as productSn, p.image as image, p.unit_id as unitId, p.label_id as labelId, p.unit_name as unitName, p.type as type, p.price as price, p.brand_id as brandId, p.brand_series_id as brandSeriesId, p.attribute_id_arr AS attributeIdArr, p.value_name_arr AS valueNameArr, p.value_id_arr AS valueIdArr from dj_basics_product p where type=1 and maket=1
and FIND_IN_SET(#{attributeIdArr},p.attribute_id_arr)
and FIND_IN_SET(#{valueIdArr},p.value_id_arr)

select p.id as id, p.name as name, p.goods_id as goodsId, p.category_id as categoryId, p.product_sn as productSn, p.image as image, p.unit_id as unitId, p.label_id as labelId, p.unit_name as unitName, p.type as type, p.price as price, p.brand_id as brandId, p.brand_series_id as brandSeriesId, p.attribute_id_arr AS attributeIdArr, p.value_name_arr AS valueNameArr, p.value_id_arr AS valueIdArr from dj_basics_product p where type=1 and maket=1 and isnull(p.brand_id) and isnull(p.brand_series_id)
and p.value_id_arr=#{valueIdArr}

select p.id as id, p.name as name, p.goods_id as goodsId, p.category_id as categoryId, p.product_sn as productSn, p.image as image, p.unit_id as unitId, p.label_id as labelId, p.unit_name as unitName, p.type as type, p.price as price, p.brand_id as brandId, p.brand_series_id as brandSeriesId, p.attribute_id_arr AS attributeIdArr, p.value_name_arr AS valueNameArr, p.value_id_arr AS valueIdArr from dj_basics_product p where type=1 and maket=1 and p.goods_id=#{goodsId}
and p.brand_series_id=#{brandSeriesId}

SELECT pg.id,pg.goods_id goodsId, g.`name`, pg.image, pg.price , pg.convert_unit convertUnit FROM dj_basics_goods g INNER JOIN ( SELECT p.id, p.goods_id, p.convert_unit, p.image, p.price FROM dj_basics_product p WHERE p.maket = 1 AND p.type = 1 ORDER BY p.create_date DESC ) pg ON g.id = pg.goods_id WHERE g.data_status = 0
AND g.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
GROUP BY g.id ORDER BY g.create_date DESC
